details:
The CodeIgniter changelog reports:

> Fixed a header injection vulnerability in common function
> set\_status\_header() under Apache (thanks to Guillermo Caminer from
> Flowgate).
>
> Fixed byte-safety issues in Encrypt Library (DEPRECATED) when
> mbstring.func\_overload is enabled.
>
> Fixed byte-safety issues in Encryption Library when
> mbstring.func\_overload is enabled.
>
> Fixed byte-safety issues in compatibility functions
> password\_hash(), hash\_pbkdf2() when mbstring.func\_overload is
> enabled.
>
> Updated Encrypt Library (DEPRECATED) to call mcrypt\_create\_iv()
> with MCRYPT\_DEV\_URANDOM.
